entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
